articles.title: Inside Mirakl's agentic commerce vision
articles.summary: Mirakl is pioneering "agentic commerce", a revolutionary approach that empowers businesses to create personalized, AI-driven shopping experiences. This innovative model enables companies to connect with customers through autonomous agents, streamlining interactions and enhancing overall customer satisfaction. By leveraging AI and machine learning, Mirakl's agentic commerce vision aims to transform the e-commerce landscape.

articles.title: Funding grants for new research into AI and mental health
articles.summary: Researchers have been awarded funding grants to explore the intersection of AI and mental health, aiming to develop innovative solutions for diagnosis, treatment, and prevention. This new research has the potential to revolutionize mental health care by leveraging AI's capabilities in data analysis and pattern recognition. The grants will support studies on AI-powered tools for personalized therapy, mental health prediction, and intervention.

articles.title: OpenAI and NORAD team up to bring new magic to “NORAD Tracks Santa”
articles.summary: OpenAI has partnered with NORAD to enhance the "NORAD Tracks Santa" program, leveraging AI technology to create a more immersive experience for children tracking Santa's journey on Christmas Eve. This collaboration aims to bring new interactive features and personalized responses to the beloved holiday tradition. With OpenAI's AI capabilities, the program promises to deliver a more magical experience for kids worldwide.

articles.title: Accenture and OpenAI accelerate enterprise AI success
articles.summary: Accenture has partnered with OpenAI to help businesses accelerate their AI adoption and drive enterprise success. This collaboration will enable companies to leverage OpenAI's innovative technologies, such as ChatGPT, to enhance their operations and customer experiences. By combining Accenture's expertise with OpenAI's AI capabilities, enterprises can unlock new opportunities for growth and innovation.

articles.title: OpenAI takes an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
articles.summary: OpenAI has taken an ownership stake in Thrive Holdings, aiming to accelerate the adoption of AI solutions in enterprises. This partnership is expected to drive innovation and growth in the industry, enabling businesses to leverage AI capabilities more effectively. By combining forces, OpenAI and Thrive Holdings can provide more comprehensive AI solutions to enterprises, transforming the way they operate and make decisions.

articles.title: AlphaFold: Five years of impact
articles.summary: AlphaFold, a revolutionary AI protein-folding model, has made significant impacts in the scientific community over the past five years, accelerating discoveries in fields like medicine and biology. Its ability to accurately predict protein structures has enabled breakthroughs in disease research and drug development. By democratizing access to protein folding predictions, AlphaFold has opened up new avenues for researchers and scientists to explore.

articles.title: Revealing a key protein behind heart disease
articles.summary: Researchers have identified a key protein that plays a crucial role in the development of heart disease, paving the way for potential new treatments. This breakthrough discovery could lead to more effective therapies and improved patient outcomes. By understanding the protein's function, scientists can now explore innovative ways to prevent or reverse heart disease.

articles.title: How we’re bringing AI image verification to the Gemini app
articles.summary: Gemini is integrating AI-powered image verification into its app, enhancing user security and trust by automatically detecting and flagging potentially fake or manipulated images. This innovation aims to combat misinformation and scams, providing a safer experience for users. By leveraging AI technology, Gemini is setting a new standard for image verification in the industry.

articles.title: Build with Nano Banana Pro, our Gemini 3 Pro Image model
articles.summary: Introducing the Nano Banana Pro, a cutting-edge model based on the Gemini 3 Pro Image, designed to empower developers and creators to build innovative applications. This powerful tool enables the generation of high-quality images, unlocking new possibilities for art, design, and more. With Nano Banana Pro, users can tap into the potential of AI-driven image creation and push the boundaries of what's possible.

articles.title: Introducing Nano Banana Pro
articles.summary: The Nano Banana Pro has been introduced, offering a compact and powerful single-board computer. This innovative device is designed to support various applications, from DIY projects to industrial automation. With its small form factor and robust features, the Nano Banana Pro is set to make a significant impact in the world of IoT and maker communities.

articles.title: Transformers v5: Simple model definitions powering the AI ecosystem
articles.summary: The latest release of Transformers v5 introduces simplified model definitions, making it easier for developers to integrate AI models into their applications. This update empowers the AI ecosystem by providing a more accessible and efficient way to work with transformer-based models. With v5, developers can now focus on building innovative AI solutions rather than spending time on complex model configurations.

articles.title: Diffusers welcomes FLUX-2
articles.summary: Diffusers has introduced FLUX-2, a new addition to its platform, which is expected to bring enhanced capabilities and features. This update is likely to improve the overall performance and user experience of Diffusers. The integration of FLUX-2 may also expand the platform's potential applications and use cases.

articles.title: Continuous batching from first principles
articles.summary: Researchers have introduced a novel approach to continuous batching, a technique that enables more efficient processing of data in artificial intelligence and machine learning models. By re-examining the fundamentals of batching, this method has the potential to significantly improve the speed and scalability of AI systems. This breakthrough could lead to enhanced performance in applications such as natural language processing and computer vision.

articles.title: 20x Faster TRL Fine-tuning with RapidFire AI
articles.summary: RapidFire AI has introduced a breakthrough technology that accelerates TRL fine-tuning by 20 times, revolutionizing the field of artificial intelligence. This innovation enables faster and more efficient training of large language models, paving the way for significant advancements in AI capabilities. With RapidFire AI, developers can now fine-tune models at unprecedented speeds, unlocking new possibilities for AI applications.

articles.title: Open ASR Leaderboard: Trends and Insights with New Multilingual & Long-Form Tracks
articles.summary: The Open ASR Leaderboard has introduced new multilingual and long-form tracks, enabling researchers to test and improve automatic speech recognition (ASR) systems in diverse languages and longer audio recordings. This expansion aims to drive innovation in ASR technology, enhancing its accuracy and applicability in real-world scenarios. The updated leaderboard provides valuable insights into the latest trends and advancements in ASR research.

articles.title: Amazon launches Trainium3
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Trainium3, a new custom-built AI chip designed to accelerate machine learning training workloads, promising significant performance and efficiency gains. This innovation is expected to enhance the capabilities of Amazon's cloud services, particularly in areas like natural language processing and computer vision. With Trainium3, Amazon aims to stay competitive in the rapidly evolving AI hardware landscape.

articles.title: OpenAI declares 'code red' as Google catches up in AI race
articles.summary: OpenAI has reportedly issued a "code red" alert as Google's AI developments, particularly its Gemini model, are gaining significant ground in the AI race. This sudden surge by Google has put pressure on OpenAI to accelerate its own advancements and maintain its competitive edge. The heightened competition is expected to drive innovation and advancements in the AI field.

articles.title: Mistral 3 family of models released
articles.summary: The Mistral 3 family of models has been released, offering a significant upgrade in natural language processing capabilities. This new generation of models boasts improved performance, efficiency, and versatility, enabling more accurate and informative interactions. The Mistral 3 models have the potential to revolutionize various applications, from chatbots to language translation tools, with their enhanced language understanding and generation capabilities.

articles.title: Apple Releases Open Weights Video Model
articles.summary: Apple has released Open Weights, an open-source video model that allows developers to create and customize their own video generation models. This innovation enables the creation of highly realistic and context-specific videos, with potential applications in fields like entertainment, education, and advertising. By making Open Weights available, Apple is democratizing access to advanced video generation technology, empowering developers to push the boundaries of video creation.

articles.title: What will enter the public domain in 2026?
articles.summary: In 2026, works published in 1925 will enter the public domain, making classic films, music, and literature from that year freely available for use and adaptation. This includes iconic works like F. Scott Fitzgerald's "The Great Gatsby" and Virginia Woolf's "Mrs. Dalloway". The public domain expansion will enable new creative interpretations and innovations, driving cultural and artistic growth.
